requirements.title: IMU
requirements.descr: The FC shall be equipped with an IMU.

requirements.title: IMU Measurements
requirements.descr: The FCS shall be able to read measurement data from the IMU. TODO which data

requirements.title: IMU Data Transmission
requirements.descr: The FCS shall transmit every $\SI{100}{\milli\second}$ IMU data to the FCPS.

requirements.title: IMU Data Reception
requirements.descr: The FCPS shall be able to receive IMU data every $\SI{100}{\milli\second}$.

requirements.title: State Estimation
requirements.descr: The FCPS shall filter the IMU and pitot data to guarantee \begin{itemize} \item an acceleration standard deviation less than \SI{0.6}{\meter \per \second^2} \item the orientation with TBD performance \item the velocity with TBD performance \item the position with TBD performance \item the altitude over the ground with TBD performance \end{itemize}

requirements.title: Launch Detection
requirements.descr: The FCPS shall use the estimated state to signal a detected launch if the acceleration is larger than \SI{6}{\meter \per \second}.

requirements.title: Pitot-Sensor
requirements.descr: The Nav shall be equipped with a Pitot Tube for Airspeed measurements.

requirements.title: Velocity Measurements
requirements.descr: The velocity shall be measured by the Nav Software.

requirements.title: Velocity Transmission
requirements.descr: The measured velocity shall be transmitted to the FCPS every $\SI{100}{\milli \second}$.

requirements.title: Velocity Reception
requirements.descr: The FCPS shall be able to receive the velocity data every $\SI{100}{\milli\second}$

requirements.title: Velocity Controller
requirements.descr: The FCPS shall be able to find a motor command such that the plane achieves the error between the estimated and the desired velocity goes to zero. with TODO performance.

requirements.title: Motor Setpoint Transmission
requirements.descr: The FCPS shall transmit the calculated motor setpoint every $\SI{100}{\milli\second}$

requirements.title: Motor Setpoint Receive
requirements.descr: The FCS shall be able to receive a motor setpoint every $\SI{100}{\milli\second}$

requirements.title: Motor Setpoint Command
requirements.descr: The FCS shall transmit every motor setpoint as a command to the EP at most $\SI{20}{\milli\second}$ after reception.

requirements.title: Motor Command Execution
requirements.descr: The EP shall react on every motor command in at most $\SI{20}{\milli\second}$.

requirements.title: Motor Characterization
requirements.descr: The EP shall react to motor commands in a deterministic manner, only influenced by the command, the load of the motor and the battery voltage. The influence of all other factors should be less than $10\%$ under normal operating conditions. TODO what are those?

requirements.title: Attitude Controller
requirements.descr: The FCS shall compute a control surface position signal which guarantees that the measured orientation follows the orientation setpoint.

requirements.title: Servo Command Transmission
requirements.descr: The FCS shall transmit the computed servo setpoint every $\SI{20}{\milli\second}$ to the CS.

requirements.title: Servo Performance
requirements.descr: The CS shall set the position of the control surfaces in accordance with the received command.

requirements.title: GPS Sensor
requirements.descr: The NAV shall be equipped with a GPS sensor.

requirements.title: GPS Measurement
requirements.descr: The NAVS shall query the GPS sensor for new data every $\SI{100}{\milli\second}$.

requirements.title: GPS Transmission
requirements.descr: The NAVS shall transmit the GPS data every $\SI{100}{\milli\second}$ to the FCPS.

requirements.title: GPS Data reception
requirements.descr: The FCPS shall be able to receive GPS data every $\SI{100}{\milli\second}$

requirements.title: Position Controller
requirements.descr: The FCPS shall find a dynamically feasible trajectory of attitudes and velocities, such that the plane reaches a predefined position with an accuracy of $\pm\SI{3}{\meter}$.

requirements.title: Barometer
requirements.descr: The NAV shall be equipped with a barometric altimeter.

requirements.title: Barometer measurement
requirements.descr: The NAVS shall read the altimeter every $\SI{100}{\milli\second}$.

requirements.title: Lidar
requirements.descr: The NAV shall be equipped with LIDAR for altitude measurements.

requirements.title: Lidar measurements
requirements.descr: The NAVS shall read the LIDAR every $\SI{100}{\milli\second}$.

requirements.title: Altitude data transmission
requirements.descr: The NAVS shall transmit the barometric and LIDAR data every $\SI{100}{\milli\second}$.

requirements.title: Altitude data reception
requirements.descr: The FCPS shall receive the altitude data every $\SI{100}{\milli\second}$.

requirements.title: Orientation Setpoint Transmission
requirements.descr: The FCPS shall transmit every $\SI{100}{\milli\second}$ the orientation and calculated by the position controller for the current timestep.

requirements.title: Orientation Setpoint Reception
requirements.descr: The FCS shall receive the orientation setpoint from the FCPS every $\SI{100}{\milli\second}$.

requirements.title: Reading Mission Configuration
requirements.descr: The FCPS shall read a list of waypoints and a target at startup. Both the waypoints and the target consists of the following information: \begin{itemize} \item Latitude \item Longitude \item Altitude above sea level \item Optional: Heading at which to pass the point \end{itemize}

requirements.title: Waypoint Handling
requirements.descr: The FCPS shall send the next waypoint as input to the position control and detect when a waypoint was hit and then forwards the next waypoint.

requirements.title: Energy Storage
requirements.descr: The EP shall provide sufficient energy for $\SI{2}{\hour}$ at cruise speed.

requirements.title: Debug Data Collection
requirements.descr: The FCPS shall collect the following data: \begin{itemize} \item All data from the FCS \item All data from the PDBS \item All data from the NAVS \item The estimated state \item The current flight state \end{itemize}

requirements.title: Cellular Module
requirements.descr: The FCP shall be equipped with a transceiver for cellular communication.

requirements.title: Debug Data Transmission
requirements.descr: The FCPS shall transmit every $\SI{100}{\milli \second}$ all debug data via the cellular connection.
